channel.title: I need some client help
channel.description:
I'm wondering how i can fix my friends list. It alerts you that people have logged in but it shows them offline and (red) when it should show green and (online). Also how can i make the command prompt disappear and the server ip appear right when you open client?
Thanks for any help.
